p: The ethanolic extract from Ocimum micranthum decreased cell proliferation in both cell lines at low concentrations (Fig.Â 3). In the case of the human fibroblast cell line, this decrease was observed at concentrations of 0.06%, 0.125% and 0.25% with relative cell proliferation percentage values of 80.82%, 82.35%, and 77.80% respectively. The CHO-K1 cell line displayed this effect at the same concentrations of extract, but with values of 77.12%, 80.08%, and 57.12% respectively.
